Sentencas: Highly reactive and nanocrystalline powders of LaCrO(3)based compositions, having the general formula La0.9Ca0.1Cr1-xMxO3-delta (0 <= x <= 0.1, and M=Al, Co, or Mg), suitable for solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications, have been synthesized using an auto-combustion technique with ammonium dichromate as the chromium source.
Titulo: Influence of B site substituents on lanthanum calcium chromite nanocrystalline materials for a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Owing to very fine crystallite size (ranging from 10 to 50 nm) and the high reactivity of the powders (surface area as high as 25 m(2)/g), the sintering temperature reduces drastically and a highly dense, uniform, and fine-grained microstructure is obtained.
Titulo: Influence of B site substituents on lanthanum calcium chromite nanocrystalline materials for a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A dramatic improvement in densification (nearly theoretical density) is observed for aluminum substitution, when sintered at as low a temperature as 1300 degrees C.
Titulo: Influence of B site substituents on lanthanum calcium chromite nanocrystalline materials for a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The microstructure shows a uniform distribution of grains having an average grain size of similar to 0.5 mu m.
Titulo: Influence of B site substituents on lanthanum calcium chromite nanocrystalline materials for a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Depending on the substituent, the electrical conductivities of the sintered samples in air, at 1000 degrees C, were found to be in the range of 10-45 S/cm, and are more than that of the values required for SOFC application.
Titulo: Influence of B site substituents on lanthanum calcium chromite nanocrystalline materials for a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients, as obtained, are also comparable with the other SOFC cell components.
Titulo: Influence of B site substituents on lanthanum calcium chromite nanocrystalline materials for a solid-oxide fuel cell
